gcci.text: H100 supply stabilizes with expanded upstream capacity, easing capex pressure as new fab nodes ramp.

gtpi.text: Token input prices remain competitive at $1.47 per 1M tokens amid aggressive API price competition and distillation-driven efficiency gains.

gagl.text: Nuclear baseload is increasingly critical to support AI-driven grid strain, with 120 TWh annual load demanding clean, firm power.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment shows cautious optimism; consolidation and tighter standards indicate sustainability over speculative overexpansion.
